page.title: 01South Harting and Uppark
page.content: Land - the area is dominated by the South Downs which run East - West through the centre of this block of country. West Harting Down has been planted up by the forestry Commission with conifers as nurse trees for beech. The remaining land is intensively farmed. People- South Harting, with its 13 Century Church, the copper spire rising above the village, is the main centre of population. Twenty three new houses are being built. Origially a farming community, the working population now travel as far as London and Portsmouth. A large number of professional people retire to the area. Leisure - Uppark, now a National Trust property, commands a spectacular view southwards to the sea. with its fine
